General.Name: Shanghai Shuixing Home Textile Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shanghai Shuixing Home Textile Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells household textiles in China. It offers bedding sets quilts, pillows, single-piece combinations, cushions, children's products, summer supplies, blankets, and other bedding products. The company sells its products under the MERCURY, STARZ HOME, BLISS, SHUIXING KIDS, and MERCURY BABY brand names. Shanghai Shuixing Home Textile Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
